Description: Wooden anthropoid inner-coffin of Pesbes; painted Hieroglyphic text and scenes of funerary deities on a layer of plaster.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 May-Oct, Museum of St.Albans, Ancient Egypt 2001 May-Dec, Stevenge Museum 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story
Associated places: Named in inscription: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt)
